homeComponent.mainHeader: Welcome to our RAG Chat System - File Manager and RAG Chat AI
homeComponent.systemDescription: Our system combines a file manager with an advanced AI chat using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology based on the content of the documents in the file manager.
homeComponent.filesManagerTitle: The file manager allows you to:
homeComponent.aiChatTitle: The AI chat with RAG technology enables:

aiChatBulletList.0: Intelligent responses based on your document content

homeComponent.summary: By integrating these two systems, you can efficiently manage your documents and obtain intelligent responses based on their content.
